articles.description: Lindsay Lohan appeared in new Pepsi holiday ads on Thursday, donning a feminine version of a Santa suit. The look called back to her Jingle Bell Rock performance in 2004's Mean Girls.
articles.content:
Lindsay Lohan appeared in two new holiday-themed Pepsi ads on Thursday, extending her return to the spotlight.
The actress, 36, donned a feminine version of a Santa suit as she wore a burgundy dress… [+2932 chars]

articles.author: Sameer Suri
articles.title: Al Pacino's ex Beverly D'Angelo talks taking their twins to her film premiere: 'it was mom's turn' - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'Of course, they've been to the Oscars and various premieres with their father,' Beverly told TooFab: 'but this was the first time it was mom's turn and we just had a fantastic time together. It was so great.'
articles.content:
Al Pacino's ex Beverly D'Angelo brought their twins Olivia and Anton, 21, to the Hollywood premiere of her new film this week.
The 71-year-old posed up a storm with her children and her niece Courtn… [+4236 chars]
